function NPC_7102196:Init( NPCID ) --[[ USERDATA 1 : Pain패턴을 보이기 위한 데미지 누적 2 : 머리 파츠 데미지 누적 3 : 왼손톱 파츠 데미지 누적 4 : 오른손톱 파츠 데미지 누적 --]]
NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 5 )
NPC_7102196.DataIdxForPain = 1 NPC_7102196.DataIdxForHorn = 2 NPC_7102196.DataIdxForLeftNail = 3 NPC_7102196.DataIdxForRightNail = 4
NPC_7102196.PartIdxForHorn = 1 NPC_7102196.PartIdxForRightNail = 2 NPC_7102196.PartIdxForLeftNail = 3 NPC_7102196.PartIdxForPain = 5
NPC_7102196.LimitForPain = NPC_7102196.MaxHP * 0.15 NPC_7102196.LimitForBreakNail = NPC_7102196.MaxHP * 0.1 NPC_7102196.LimitForBreakHorn = NPC_7102196.MaxHP * 0.1
NPC_7102196.TalIdPain1 = 210211003 NPC_7102196.TalIdPain2 = 210211004
NPC_7102196.TalIdRage = 210211003
NPC_7102196.TalIdLeftClawAttack = 210211011 NPC_7102196.TalIdLeftHandAttack = 210211041
NPC_7102196.TalIdSlidingClawAttack = 210211021 NPC_7102196.TalIdSlidingHandAttack = 210211022
NPC_7102196.BuffIdRage = 40171 end
function NPC_7102196:LeftHandAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:CheckBPart(3) then -- 손톱이 없으면 손으로 때리고 ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_7102196.TalIdLeftHandAttack, Enemy ) else -- 손톱이 있으면 손톱으로 긁는다. ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_7102196.TalIdLeftClawAttack, Enemy ) end end
function NPC_7102196:SlidingAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) then -- 손톱이 없으면 손으로 때리고 ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_7102196.TalIdSlidingHandAttack, Enemy ) else -- 손톱이 있으면 손톱으로 긁는다. ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_7102196.TalIdSlidingClawAttack, Enemy ) end end
function NPC_7102196:OnFinishAndAggroShort( ThisActor, Enemy ) AsNPC(ThisActor):Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_7102196:AccDamage( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) -- Acc damage parts if PartsIdx <= 3 then if NPC_7102196:AccDamageForBreakPart( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) then return HitInfo end end
return NPC_7102196:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_7102196:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) if ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_7102196.TalIdRage then return end
local DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForPain ) + HitInfo.Damage
if DmgAcc < NPC_7102196.LimitForPain then ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForPain, DmgAcc ) return end
if ( not ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) ) or ( ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_7102196.TalIdPain1 ) ) then return end
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7102196.TalIdPain1 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForPain, 0 )
return end
function NPC_7102196:AccDamageForBreakPart( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) --GLog( "AccDamageForBreakPart : (" .. PartsIdx ..")\n" )
if ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_7102196.TalIdRage or -- 분노 탤런트중이거나 ThisNPC:CheckBPart( PartsIdx ) then -- 파츠가 뽀개져 있거나 return false end
-- 데미지 누적 체크 local DmgAcc = 0 if PartsIdx == NPC_7102196.PartIdxForHorn then -- 뿔 DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForHorn ) + HitInfo.Damage if DmgAcc < NPC_7102196.LimitForBreakHorn then ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForHorn, DmgAcc ) return false end end
if PartsIdx == NPC_7102196.PartIdxForRightNail then -- 오른손톱 DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForRightNail ) + HitInfo.Damage if DmgAcc < NPC_7102196.LimitForBreakNail then ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForRightNail, DmgAcc ) return false end end
if PartsIdx == NPC_7102196.PartIdxForLeftNail then -- 왼손톱 DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForLeftNail ) + HitInfo.Damage if DmgAcc < NPC_7102196.LimitForBreakNail then ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForLeftNail, DmgAcc ) return false end end
--GLog( "Prepare BreakPart\n" ) -- 파괴로직 -- 모션이 쿨타임중만 아니라면 파츠를 파괴한다. if PartsIdx == NPC_7102196.PartIdxForHorn then if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_7102196.TalIdPain1 ) then return false end
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7102196.TalIdPain1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( PartsIdx, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForHorn, 0 )
-- 그로기 상태가 너무자주 노출되지 않도록 글로벌 Pain의 누적수치를 리셋한다. ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForPain, 0 )
return true elseif PartsIdx == NPC_7102196.PartIdxForRightNail then if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_7102196.TalIdPain2 ) then return false end
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7102196.TalIdPain2 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( PartsIdx, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForRightNail, 0 )
-- 그로기 상태가 너무자주 노출되지 않도록 글로벌 Pain의 누적수치를 리셋한다. ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForPain, 0 )
return true
elseif PartsIdx == NPC_7102196.PartIdxForLeftNail then if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_7102196.TalIdPain2 ) then return false end
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7102196.TalIdPain2 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( PartsIdx, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForLeftNail, 0 )
-- 그로기 상태가 너무자주 노출되지 않도록 글로벌 Pain의 누적수치를 리셋한다. ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_7102196.DataIdxForPain, 0 )
return true end
return false end
function NPC_7102196:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 5 do this:SetUserData( i, 0 ) end end
